LanguageData.WNA_AdvMortar.label: adv. mortar
LanguageData.WNA_AdvMortar_Gun.label: adv mortar
LanguageData.WNA_AdvMortar_Gun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: adv mortar
LanguageData.WNA_Deadzone.label: dead zone irradiator
LanguageData.WNA_Deadzone.description: A facility that can emit strong radiation field, making a wide area a "dead zone". note that this facility cannot distinguish enemies and allies.
LanguageData.WNA_DesoTurret.label: desolator turret
LanguageData.WNA_DesoTurret.description: A slab-like facility, can automatically form a mana ball and actively attack nearby enemies.
LanguageData.WNA_DesoTurret_Gun.label: desolator
LanguageData.WNA_DesoTurret_Proj.label: radbeam
LanguageData.WNA_PrismTower.label: "comet" laser gun
LanguageData.WNA_PrismTower.description: A slab-like facility, can automatically form a mana ball and actively attack nearby enemies.
LanguageData.WNA_PrismTower_Gun.label: comet
LanguageData.WNA_PrismTower_Proj.label: comet
LanguageData.WNA_SentryGun.label: "scorpion" sentry gun
LanguageData.WNA_SentryGun_Gun.label: sentry gun
LanguageData.WNA_SentryGun_Proj.label: sentry gun
LanguageData.WNA_SpikeTrap.label: spike trap
LanguageData.WNA_SpikeTrap.description: Several blades half-burried underground with a set of specially designed trigger. If some careless person steps on it, the blades will teach this person an unforgettable lesson - sometimes a last lesson in their life. The heavier this trap is, the more deadly it is.
